item.title: Toritsukare Otoko Anime Film Announced by Shin-Ei Animation, Premieres Fall 2025
item.description: Bandai Namco Filmworks has officially announced an anime film adaptation of Shinji Ishii’s novel ‘Toritsukare Otoko.’ This musical film is scheduled to premiere in Japan in Fall 2025.
